bathroom.q: What’s included in a bathroom deep clean?
bathroom.a: Detailing of tiles and grout, shower screens and glass, tapware and fittings, vents and fans, mirrors and vanity, toilet sanitisation, and edges where soap scum builds up.
Usually 1–3 hours depending on bathroom size and condition.

bathroom.q: Do you fix mould or silicone?
bathroom.a: We remove surface mould and soap scum; structural silicone replacement is not included.
Yes, we bring professional cleaning products and tools suitable for bathrooms.

bond.q: What’s included in a bond clean?
bond.a: Kitchen (including oven), bathrooms and grout, internal windows/sills/tracks, cupboards/drawers in/out, skirtings and switches, reachable fans/vents, and all floors. We finish with a daylight detail pass for marks and edges.

Paint repairs, silicone or structural fixes, unsafe exterior access, pest control, and specialist stain removal unless scoped as add-ons. Tell us if carpets or external windows are required by your lease.
Small unit: ~3–6 hours. Larger homes take longer. Add time for heavy ovens, many blinds, internal windows/tracks, and carpet steam cleaning.

bond.q: Do you guarantee my bond back?
bond.a: We provide 7-day re-clean support aligned to your property manager’s feedback. If something’s missed within the window, we return and fix it.

bond.q: Do I need to be home?
bond.a: No—just ensure power and water are on and we have access (keys, codes, parking). We’ll update you and confirm when done.
Fixed quotes based on size, condition and add-ons. If the home differs materially from your brief, we’ll confirm any change before work—no surprises.

bond.q: Do you clean reachable external windows?
bond.a: Yes, as an add-on where safe and reachable from ground level. High-risk access isn’t included.

bond.q: What if the agent asks for changes?
bond.a: Send their list. We’ll schedule a re-clean within 7 days and target the exact items they flagged.

spring.q: What’s included in a spring clean?
spring.a: A top-to-bottom refresh: kitchen surfaces and appliances exteriors, bathrooms, skirting boards, window tracks, fans, light fittings, dusting, floors and cobweb removal. Add-ons like oven or fridge deep clean are available on request.

spring.q: How long does a spring clean take?
spring.a: Most homes take 4–8 hours depending on size, condition and selected add-ons. We’ll confirm timing when we quote.

spring.q: Do you bring supplies and equipment?
spring.a: Yes — our team brings professional products and gear. If you have sensitivities, let us know and we can use low-fragrance alternatives.

spring.q: Can I customise the spring clean?
spring.a: Absolutely. Tell us what matters most (e.g., fans, tracks, wet areas) and we’ll tailor the checklist to suit your home.

generic.a: Yes, we offer same-day bond cleaning service subject to availability. Contact us early in the day for best availability.

generic.q: What is your bond back guarantee?
generic.a: We provide a 100% bond back guarantee. If you don't get your full bond back due to cleaning issues, we'll return and fix any problems free of charge.

generic.q: How long does a bond clean take?
generic.a: A typical bond clean takes 4-8 hours depending on the size and condition of the property. We'll provide an accurate time estimate when quoting.

generic.q: Do you bring your own cleaning supplies?
generic.a: Yes, we bring all professional-grade cleaning supplies and equipment. You don't need to provide anything.

generic.q: Can I get a quote over the phone?
generic.a: We can provide an initial estimate over the phone, but we recommend an in-person inspection for the most accurate quote.
